Daisy's Story

Daisy is my sweet golden retriever that is looking for a new friend. Daisy enjoys playing fetch at the park, swimming in the river, and short hikes. Daisy is friendly with all dogs but only is ever interested in playing with others her size.

Other Medical Information:

Daisy has Hip Dysplasia which can cause a limp at times.
